title: 服务器联机崩溃
author: voklarl
txt_content:
在登陆多人服务器之后，一旦进入某个游戏区域，游戏就会自动跳出，然后再登陆的时候，5秒以内必定跳出。
使用的是和其他人一样的安装包，其他人进入任何区域皆没有出现类似问题。使用的角色身上没有携带任何物品。建立新角色问题如旧。

安装的JAVA是1.8最新版64位，游戏客户端内存设定为3072GB，系统是WIN8 64位，内存8G。调整内存设定为512-6144皆无效。重装JAVA无效。内存扫描后无问题报告。

错误报告如下：
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000002852ae15, pid=5528, tid=0x0000000000001f24
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_171-b11) (build 1.8.0_171-b11)
Minecraft: # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.171-b11 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
Minecraft: # Problematic frame:
Minecraft: # C  [ig75icd64.dll+0x6ae15]
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: # Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: # An error report file with more information is saved as:
Minecraft: # C:\Users\Lenovo\Documents\Tencent Files\（QQ号）\FileRecv\ENGLISH VERSION\.minecraft\hs_err_pid5528.log
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
Minecraft: #   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
Minecraft: # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
Minecraft: # See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
Minecraft: #
Minecraft: AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

[01:15:30] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: 1
[01:15:30] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: 1


请问这是怎样一回事呢？

replies.author: 大海Sea
replies.txt_content: 重置那个地图，区块坏了

replies.author: voklarl
replies.txt_content:
972063175 发表于 2018-6-24 13:02
重置那个地图，区块坏了
不好意思想请问一下，如果是区块坏了的话，为什么其他人可以正常出入呢？

replies.author: voklarl
replies.txt_content: 顶一下。备注：其他人使用我的账号可以正常游戏

replies.author: 大海Sea
replies.txt_content:
voklarl 发表于 2018-6-24 15:48
不好意思想请问一下，如果是区块坏了的话，为什么其他人可以正常出入呢？ ...
没到那个地图的区块，区块坏只是其中一块，离得远就没事
